mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO pc_${tableName}_months ( `id`, `serial_number`, `switch_index`, `switch_sn`, `${tableName}`, `s_year`, `s_month`, `s_day`, `create_time`, `user_id`, `project_id` ) VALUES
( NULL, #{item.serialNumber}, #{item.switchIndex}, #{item.switchSn}, #{item.data}, #{item.year}, #{item.month}, #{item.day}, NOW(), #{item.userId}, #{item.projectId} )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, serial_number AS serialNumber, switch_index AS switchIndex, switch_sn AS switchSn, s_year AS year, s_month AS month, AVG(${tableName}) AS data, project_id AS projectId FROM pc_${tableName}_months WHERE s_year = #{year} AND s_month = #{month} GROUP BY serial_number,switch_sn,project_id
